text: Orders are processed within 24 hours of payment confirmation.
Premium customers have priority support and a dedicated manager.
We use eventual consistency for order status across microservices.
Refunds are issued within 5–7 business days after review.
Customer data is encrypted at rest and in transit.
Standard support operates Monday to Friday, 9am–6pm local time.
The API rate limit is 1000 requests per minute per API key.
Service credits are applied automatically on the next billing cycle.
All production deployments require approval from at least two maintainers.
Incident response aims for an initial update within 15 minutes of detection.
